data.title: Dr. Randall Edwards Family Vision Care
data.meta_description: Rapid City, SD Optometrist specializing in eye exams and contact lens fitting. We are dedicated to serving you and the community by providing utmost in customer service and trusted family eye care.
data.text:
Welcome!

Dr. Randall Edwards Family Vision Care was started in Deer Lodge Montana, but moved to it's current location of Rapid City, SD in 2009.

Here at Dr. Randall Edwards Family Vision Care we provide comprehensive eye exams at a very affordable cost along with emergency care and reasonable contact lens fittings. We strive to provide patients with efficient and competent eye care, paying special attention to glasses prescriptions, contact lens fittings and contact lens sales.

In addition to helping you see well, we take pride in treating most eye diseases, infections, and ocular emergencies. Please contact our office to schedule routine exams or eye emergencies. Walk-ins are always welcome and we take many insurance plans. We also sell contact lenses at our office or you can order contacts through our website.
